title: Updating VAT percentage in product information
description: Updating the VAT percentage should be possible without creating a new product. The tax rate history should be available based on change occurrences and visible on the UI.
development_proposal_and_clarification: Proposal to update VAT rate for product info change.
solution_suggestion: Enable update of VAT rate without creating a new product.
impact_on_market: Minor impact on market.
argumentation_for_proposal: Supports product data flexibility for new VAT requirements.

title: Notification of accounting point ID change
description: Changing DH-311-4, DH-331-3, DH-351-3 notifications to send related accounting point ID instead of the main accounting point ID.
development_proposal_and_clarification: Proposal to clarify accounting point ID logic.
solution_suggestion: Update notification to reflect accurate accounting point data.
proposal_resolution: Seeking feedback from accounting systems integration teams.
impact_on_market: Moderate impact on supplier systems.
argumentation_for_proposal: Improves clarity in accounting point communication.

title: Contract retrospective cancellation notification
description: Validating that grid and sales agreements correspond for the same customer when confirming the grid contract.
development_proposal_and_clarification: Proposal for customer validation to align grid and sales agreements.
solution_suggestion: Ensure customer ID matches between grid and sales agreements.
impact_on_market: Significant impact on market operations.
argumentation_for_proposal: Improves system consistency and reduces errors.

title: Customer information validation on grid contract
description: Validation to ensure that grid agreement corresponds to the sales contract customer.
development_proposal_and_clarification: Update the DH-312-1 request to include customer info for validation.
solution_suggestion: Customer ID check required to match sales agreement.
impact_on_market: Minor impact on grid companies.
argumentation_for_proposal: Validates contract accuracy and reduces data inconsistencies.

title: PO Box and Street Address validation
description: Validation rule to ensure only one address type (PO Box or street) is given, and building number requires a street name.
development_proposal_and_clarification: Ensure only one address type is included and building numbers have street names.
solution_suggestion: Reject both PO Box and street address if submitted together.
impact_on_market: Minimal impact on customer systems.
argumentation_for_proposal: Addresses data quality issues.

title: Agreement end date notification
description: Allow a supplier or DSO to notify contract end dates when a new contract starts on the same day.
development_proposal_and_clarification: Ensure contract end notifications match contract terms for new agreements.
solution_suggestion: Allow simultaneous end date notifications without data conflicts.
proposal_resolution: Recommendation to avoid errors when contracts overlap.
impact_on_market: Moderate impact on market operations.
argumentation_for_proposal: Supports contract management and reduces notification errors.

title: Fixed Term Agreement validation update
description: Modify validation rules to check fixed term dates only when updated.
development_proposal_and_clarification: Only apply fixed term date validation when changes are made to the dates.
solution_suggestion: Change validation logic for fixed term agreement updates.
impact_on_market: Low impact on market.
argumentation_for_proposal: Improves flexibility in contract management.

title: Disconnection notification chain
description: Implement message IDs to track connection and disconnection requests for better process management.
development_proposal_and_clarification: Implement a new field to track the source of disconnections (supplier or DSO).
solution_suggestion: Add message ID to track disconnection origin.
impact_on_market: High impact on grid operators.
argumentation_for_proposal: Improves tracking and process reliability.

title: DSO Notification on Unconfirmed GAG
description: DSO to receive info of SAG (sales agreement) end or cancellation when GAG is not confirmed.
development_proposal_and_clarification: Currently, the DH-331 and DH-341 processes send a notification to the DSO only if the corresponding grid agreement is confirmed. The processes will be changed so that a notification is sent also if the grid agreement is unconfirmed.
solution_suggestion: Change the processes so that the DSO receives the information even if the GAG is unconfirmed.
ticket_number: Verkko saisi tiedon jos myyjä heti peruu tai päättää sopimuksen.
impact_on_market: Verkko saisi tiedon sopimuksen päättymisestä myös ilman vahvistettua verkkosopimusta.
priority: Define requirements and update documentation for system provider.
argumentation_for_proposal: Sopimusprosessi

title: Customer Data Validation
description: Customer data characters to be verified for proper data updates to Datahub.
development_proposal_and_clarification: Validation should be added to DH-111, DH-112, DH-113, and DH-311 to prevent unnecessary characters in customer data.
solution_suggestion: Implement regex validation to avoid certain characters.
impact_on_market: Improved data quality through character validation.
priority: Identify the impact of different characters used in customer data and resolve this.
argumentation_for_proposal: Asiakastietoprosessi

title: Email Invoice Validation
description: Email invoice should be updatedable only if correct invoice channel is chosen.
development_proposal_and_clarification: Add validation rules to DH-310 and DH-320 processes to ensure correct invoice channel is selected before other electronic invoicing data can be added.
solution_suggestion: Validation rule to ensure only "E-mail" or "Mobile invoice" are valid invoice channels.
impact_on_market: Ensuring that only correct invoice methods are selected.
priority: Review implementation and ensure compliance with new rules.
argumentation_for_proposal: Sopimusprosessi

title: Data Interface Security
description: API method should use POST instead of GET for sensitive data security.
development_proposal_and_clarification: Change the data interface to use POST for sensitive data like personal and company IDs to prevent them from being logged in URL.
solution_suggestion: Support both GET and POST for 6 months during transition.
impact_on_market: Improved data security by switching to POST method.
priority: Define the transition process and update security documentation.
argumentation_for_proposal: Tietoturva

title: Accounting Point Supplier Notification
description: Update accounting point info for future suppliers when status changes.
development_proposal_and_clarification: Send updates on accounting point changes to future suppliers.
solution_suggestion: Notification of all relevant accounting point updates to future suppliers.
ticket_number: Helpottaisi myyjää kyllä jos saisi tiedon.
impact_on_market: Improved clarity for suppliers on accounting point status.
priority: Review GDPR concerns and proceed with feasibility study.
argumentation_for_proposal: Sopimusprosessi

title: Phone Number Format Validation
description: Validate phone numbers in ITU-T.164 format.
development_proposal_and_clarification: Add validation for phone numbers to ensure they match ITU-T.164 format.
solution_suggestion: Ensure phone numbers are correctly formatted and validated.
impact_on_market: Better data quality for phone number handling.
priority: Proceed with validation implementation and testing.
argumentation_for_proposal: Asiakastietoprosessi

title: AR04 Cancellation Code Re-evaluation
description: Re-evaluate AR04 cancellation code for contract terminations.
development_proposal_and_clarification: Reconsider the usage of AR04 to prevent improper grid agreement cancellations.
solution_suggestion: Abandon AR04 or ensure grid contracts are cancelled when AR04 is used.
ticket_number: Aiheuttaa paljon manuaalikäsittelyä verkon suunnalla ja jos verkkosopimusta ei erikseen peruta voi tieto toimitussopimuksesta jäädä väärin ja aiheuttaa ongelmia mm. asiakkaan laskutuksessa.
impact_on_market: Reevaluate current cancellation rules to avoid manual handling and incorrect billing information.
priority: Review the rules in the development workgroup and proceed with changes.
argumentation_for_proposal: Sopimusprosessi

title: Agreement Identification in DH-341-3
description: Include agreement identification in DH-341-3 notifications.
development_proposal_and_clarification: Add agreement identification to the DH-341-3 notification to help suppliers link notifications to the correct agreements.
solution_suggestion: Ensure the DH-341-3 notification includes agreement identification for clarity.
ticket_number: Myyjä ei pysty kohdistamaan kumpaa sopimusta ilmoitus koskee mikäli on ollut kaksi sopimusta jotka palautetaan voimaan uuden sopimuksen peruutuksessa.
impact_on_market: Ensuring correct linking of notifications to agreements.
priority: Review and implement changes for better clarity in notifications.
argumentation_for_proposal: Sopimusprosessi

title: Re-evaluation of Metering Point State Change
description: Metering point state change from 'Under construction' to the 'Switched' rules shall be re-evaluated. The current rules say that if metering point 'Under construction' has valid contract when it is switched on, datahub will automatically contract valid start from date according to the switching date. This serves handling of new metering points. But same functionality/rules are valid also when metering point has been changed due to renovation to the 'Under construction' state, without updates on contract state.
development_proposal_and_clarification: Handling of agreement start date updates when connecting an accounting point will be changed in Datahub according to the separate appendix: In addition, a notification is sent to the supplier and the DSO about the updated start dates of their contracts. A new message type is added for the notification.
solution_suggestion: Handling of agreement start date updates when connecting an accounting point will be changed in Datahub according to the separate appendix. Additionally, a new message type is introduced for notification.
proposal_resolution: Solution to be implemented: Confirmed with stakeholders in 13.4.2023.
impact_on_market: High impact on market and stakeholders due to frequent disruptions and confusion in contract dates
argumentation_for_proposal: Proposal affects suppliers and DSOs; new message type and process updates required
proposal_impact: Ensuring clarity on the switch date rules to avoid unnecessary contract date updates during renovations.
next_steps: Continue with clarification and detailed proposal presentation.

title: Validation of User Group for Metering Point
description: New validation rule for the event DH-124-1 so that supplier cannot request user group BE14 in case there has been a specific user group defined for the metering point. At the moment DSO systems update user group automatically and thus the specific user group information is lost.
development_proposal_and_clarification: Implement a validation rule where user group BE14 is not allowed in the accounting point data update request.
solution_suggestion: Implement a rule to ensure user group BE14 cannot be requested in the DH-124 process if a specific user group has been defined.
proposal_resolution: Confirmed with stakeholders and investigating the BE14 issue further.
impact_on_market: Improved data quality and user group consistency
argumentation_for_proposal: Existing process leads to errors and lost user group data
proposal_impact: Clarify BE14 issue with stakeholders and propose resolution based on feedback.

title: Personal ID Validation Rule Update
description: Change in personal identification system to accept new divider signs/letters for people born in the 20th and 21st centuries as of 2023. In addition, allow for '+' sign for deceased person estate customers.
development_proposal_and_clarification: Change the existing validation rule to allow new divider signs in personal identification numbers. Also, accept the '+' sign for deceased persons' personal IDs.
solution_suggestion: Update the validation rule to handle new divider signs and the '+' sign in personal IDs.
proposal_resolution: Proceed with clarifications for implementation and documentation update.
impact_on_market: High need for new divider signs from both children and immigrants receiving Finnish ID
argumentation_for_proposal: Required change for future-proofing personal identification system for both native and immigrant population
proposal_impact: Work on detailed specification update and request for supplier offer

title: Handling End Event with New Move-In
description: Grid needs to handle cases where an agreement is ended due to a new move-in but should not erroneously revert if the move-in is cancelled.
development_proposal_and_clarification: DSO should respond to DH-333 even when the agreement has ended due to a new move-in, and ensure the agreement does not wrongly revert if the move-in is cancelled.
solution_suggestion: Modify grid response to DH-333 to prevent incorrect reactivation of the previous agreement upon cancellation of a move-in.
proposal_resolution: Work with stakeholders to implement solution by handling cases in the DH-333 processing stage.
impact_on_market: Significant manual effort to prevent erroneous grid agreement reactivation
argumentation_for_proposal: Ensuring grid agreements do not reactivate unnecessarily causes extra operational work
proposal_impact: Focus on collaboration with team to finalize requirements and move forward with proposed solution.

title: Improvement for DH-311-4 notification rule
description: Add a rule to DH-311-4 notification for same supplier at accounting point
development_proposal_and_clarification: Market development group has recommended this earlier: Add a rule to the DH-311-4 notification to the supplier of the related accounting point that the notification is not sent if the supplier and the customer(s) of the related accounting point are the same as the supplier and the customer(s) of the new move-in agreement.
solution_suggestion: Add the rule to the notification logic that prevents sending of DH-311-4 if both the supplier and the customer(s) are the same for both the consumption and production accounting points.
proposal_resolution: Suositus tarkennuksella ehdotettuun ratkaisukuvaukseen, että DH-311-4 ei lähde, jos sekä myyjä että asiakas ovat samat kulutus- ja tuotantokäyttöpaikoilla.
argumentation_for_proposal: Mahdollisesti poistaa tarpeettomia sanomia riippuen osapuolen pään toteutuksesta.
proposal_impact: Suositus tarkennuksella ehdotettuun ratkaisukuvaukseen, että DH-311-4 ei lähde, jos sekä myyjä että asiakas ovat samat kulutus- ja tuotantokäyttöpaikoilla.
next_steps: 21.9.2023: Kehitystyöryhmässä oli tähän erilaisia näkemyksiä, myös sen suhteen, tulisiko muutosta toteuttaa ollenkaan. Selvennetään vielä tähän liittyvää kysymystä ja jatketaan ehdotuksen käsittelyä seuraavassa kehitystyöryhmässä.
categories: 09.11.2023 Lopputulemana päädyttiin siihen, että selvitetään vielä, onko asia tarve viedä alityöryhmään keskusteltavaksi.

title: Automating Supplier Ending Process
description: Automate the supplier ending process to reduce manual errors
development_proposal_and_clarification: Development proposal to automate the process of supplier ending to reduce manual work and eliminate errors.
solution_suggestion: Add a tool to automatically process the termination of supplier agreements, removing the need for manual email communication and providing operators with a clear process.
proposal_resolution: Develop an automated process that allows operators to verify the situation before proceeding to the next step in supplier ending.
argumentation_for_proposal: Manualityössä suurempi virhemahdollisuus. Lisäksi käsin tehtävää työtä pystytään vähentämään huomattavasti sekä nopeuttamaan käsittelyä.
proposal_impact: Valmisteltava kokonaisuutena muiden aihepiiriin liittyvien kehitysehdotusten kanssa ja tarvitaan tarkempi kustannusarvio kokonaisuudelle.
next_steps:
Sopimusprosessi	2.2
22	Agreement Restoration Refusal Issue	Fix the issue with refusing agreement restoration in case of supplier change	REJECTED	2024-11-09 00:00:00	2024-11-09 00:00:00	1	Refuse restoration of sales agreement if restoration conflicts with the original termination date."
categories: The system should allow refusal of the agreement restoration to the original termination date.
planned_release_version: Refuse restored sales agreement request problem: It should be possible for the DDQ to refuse the agreements restoring to the original end date.
column24: Ei voida toteuttaa, koska voi aiheuttaa tilanteen, jossa käyttöpaikan kulutus siirtyy takautuvasti jakeluverkon häviöihin
column25: Tarkastuksen jälkeen todettu että ei voida edistää. Katso perustelut.

title: Market Operator Cancellation Enhancement
description: Develop the market operator cancellation process
development_proposal_and_clarification: Enhance the market operator cancellation process to reduce manual work and improve communication with market parties.
solution_suggestion: Make the cancellation process automatic to avoid manual emails and provide better communication to market parties.
proposal_resolution: Enhance the cancellation process by automating email notifications to all affected parties.
argumentation_for_proposal: Erittäin paljon käsin tehtävää työtä päivittäin operaattorilla. Työllistää osapuolia myös paljon jotta saadaan sopimus voimaan.
next_steps: 21.9.2023: Selvennetään vielä tähän liittyvää kysymystä ja jatketaan ehdotuksen käsittelyä seuraavassa kehitystyöryhmässä.

title: Netting Calculation Data Notification
description: Implement a notification system for netting calculation to DSO
development_proposal_and_clarification: DSO should receive notifications about accounting points that are part of netting calculation.
solution_suggestion: Add a notification system that informs DSOs about which accounting points belong to netting calculation, and ensure the data is available when changes occur.
proposal_resolution: Implement the notification system for netting calculation to DSO to ensure smooth operation in the metering data systems.
argumentation_for_proposal: Jakeluverkonhaltija saa tiedon käyttöpaikkojen kuulumisesta netotuslaskentaan.
categories: 13.4.2023: Alityöryhmä ei suositellut, ongelma yksittäisissä järjestelmissä, jatketaan selvittelyä järjestelmätoimittajien kanssa.
